name: William Billiam's Big Adventure
description:
You play as William Billiam, a child in elementary school who goes to get his toy from the Lost & Found and gets more than he bargained for. 

Controls: 

WASD - Move 

LSHIFT - Run 

E - Interact/Pick-up 

ESC - Pause 

Note: This an updated build from the one submitted for Global Game Jam that fixes some of the technical issues.

Team:

Cole Horvat - Programming

Nvikelo Nyathi - Art & Animation/Audio

Ben Williams - Design
